projectDescription: BlueJestic is a social media platform similar to Facebook that allows users to create profiles, share posts, like and comment on content, send friend requests, and follow users. It also includes a marketplace for buying and selling items, similar to Facebook's marketplace feature. The platform supports real-time messaging, media uploads, and secure authentication, optimized for scalability and performance.
Swapping contract with Uniswap that converts ETH to the respective tokens.

NFT minting site on EVM compatible blockchains, using the ERC1155 smart contract. It allows users to create a new collection, deploy the contract and mint the NFTs automatically without any developments.
RedGreen1 is an ERC20 token with a fixed supply, deployed on the Polygon mainnet, and listed on exchanges like Uniswap and Sushiswap

Reetro.io is a project management tool inspired by platforms like Jira and ClickUp, providing a full-stack solution to help teams manage projects, track tasks, collaborate, and monitor progress. With a React.js frontend and Node.js backend, the platform offers features like task management, Kanban boards, sprint planning, real-time notifications, and reports. Users can assign tasks, comment, manage teams, and track time spent on tasks. Real-time collaboration and updates are enabled through WebSockets or third-party services.

I've led in-depth analyses and development within a multi-chain ecosystem, focusing on Polkadot, DAOs, and DeFi. My role involves pioneering interoperable blockchain solutions, auditing NFT and smart contract security, and utilizing IPFS and web3.js. I excel in consensus building, strategic market research, and fostering innovation within my team.

ARISwap is an ERC721 token with extended functionalities for bidding and fixed price sales. The contract supports minting new NFTs, opening them for bidding, placing bids, accepting offers, and managing fixed price sales. It includes safety checks and fee mechanisms to ensure secure and fair transactions.

HMS is a decentralized healthcare management system built on Polygon L2 to securely store and manage patient records. It enables role-based access for patients, hospitals, and administrators, ensuring privacy, transparency, and immutability using smart contracts and IPFS. To enhance security and off-chain data integrity, it implements EIP-712 signature verification, allowing users to sign and verify data updates off-chain before committing them to the blockchain, reducing gas costs and ensuring trustless verification.
Wolverinu is an ERC20 token featuring ownership, transaction fees, cooldown mechanisms, and Uniswap integration. The project leverages Hardhat for contract compilation, testing, and deployment.

Icury ERC1155 is a multi-asset token standard that supports the creation of fungible and non-fungible tokens within a single contract. The project leverages Polygon for scalability and OpenZeppelin for contract security.

Artefy.io is a decentralized marketplace for NFTs, allowing users to discover, buy, and sell unique digital assets. The platform offers a seamless user experience with features like bidding, auctions, and instant purchases.

ADAMANTIUM is a BEP-20 token contract with standard BEP-20 functions, transaction fees, maximum transaction limits, fee exclusions, and Dex integration for liquidity pairs. It includes ownership management and uses the SafeMath library for safe arithmetic operations.

Wolverinu Staking allows users to stake their ERC20 tokens and earn rewards. The contract supports multiple staking options and is built with security in mind. Users can monitor their staked assets and rewards in real-time.

AirDropRc31 is a contract for distributing ERC20 tokens to multiple addresses efficiently. The contract is designed for large-scale airdrops, ensuring fair and secure token distribution with minimal transaction fees.

Icury is an ERC20 token contract designed to facilitate the creation, management, and transfer of tokens. This project includes standard ERC20 functionalities, such as minting, burning, and transferring tokens, along with additional security measures to ensure safe transactions.

projectSlogan: ERC20 Token Chain Migration, Deployment and Airdrop
projectDescription: NolimitCoin is a token on the Polygon network where I implemented airdrop functionality using scripting with ethers.js and JavaScript. This included migrating token holders from Binance Smart Chain (BSC) to Polygon via airdrops. The token is now listed on major exchanges such as Uniswap and Sushiswap.

OneMint.io is a platform designed to create a Mint-like NFT marketplace that allows users to mint, buy, and sell NFTs. Built using Next.js for the frontend and NestJS for backend logic, the marketplace integrates with MetaMask to handle cryptocurrency transactions. Smart contracts written in Solidity are deployed on Ethereum or Binance Smart Chain, handling the minting, transferring, and tracking of NFTs. Users can mint NFTs following ERC-721 or ERC-1155 standards, with metadata stored on decentralized storage platforms like IPFS or Filecoin.
